TEXT.S: kiloma'an o kiloma'an ahana'nay i,masasiroro'ay kosowal no kasaniyaroaro'.o kilomaa'an hananay no katimolomol,o ilisin hananay no ka'amiamis. o kapot aca o selal o kapot hananay i o ksacecacecay nomasakapotay kakita'an o kakridan no niyaro' misacepo' i sakasepat a folad i tarariyar a misacepo'.
